'''Simple Otogi Street Lamp''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Simple Otogi Street Lamp is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest southwest of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] at [[Moshiri Ceremonial Site]] on Tsurumi Island.
